title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 166-1.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 166-1.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Subpart is to set forth regulations and
procedures for the protection of youth from child abuse and maltreatment in
division-operated residential facilities and programs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
166-1.1

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
